allOf.description: A generic Asana Resource, containing a globally unique identifier.

gid.description: Globally unique identifier of the resource, as a string.

resource_type.description: The base type of this resource.

allOf.description: A *user* object represents an account in Asana that can be given access to various workspaces, projects, and tasks.

name.description: *Read-only except when same user as requester*. The userâ€™s name.

allOf.description: The user who triggered the event.
A generic Asana Resource, containing a globally unique identifier.

gid.description: Globally unique identifier of the resource, as a string.

resource_type.description: The base type of this resource.

allOf.description: The resource which has triggered the event by being modified in some way.

type.description: *Deprecated: Refer to the resource_type of the resource.* The type of the resource that generated the event.

action.description: The type of action taken on the **resource** that triggered the event.  This can be one of `changed`, `added`, `removed`, `deleted`, or `undeleted` depending on the nature of the event.

allOf.description: A generic Asana Resource, containing a globally unique identifier.

gid.description: Globally unique identifier of the resource, as a string.

resource_type.description: The base type of this resource.

allOf.description: For added/removed events, the parent object that resource was added to or removed from. The parent will be `null` for other event types.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the event occurred.

change.description: Information about the type of change that has occurred. This field is only present when the value of the property `action`, describing the action taken on the **resource**, is `changed`.

field.description: The name of the field that has changed in the resource.

action.description: The type of action taken on the **field** which has been changed.  This can be one of `changed`, `added`, or `removed` depending on the nature of the change.

new_value.description: *Conditional.* This property is only present when the **field's** `action` is `changed` and the `new_value` is an Asana resource. This will be only the `gid` and `resource_type` of the resource when the events come from webhooks; this will be the compact representation (and can have fields expanded with [opt_fields](/docs/input-output-options)) when using the [Events](/docs/asana-events) resource.

added_value.description: *Conditional.* This property is only present when the **field's** `action` is `added` and the `added_value` is an Asana resource. This will be only the `gid` and `resource_type` of the resource when the events come from webhooks; this will be the compact representation (and can have fields expanded with [opt_fields](/docs/input-output-options)) when using the [Events](/docs/asana-events) resource.

removed_value.description: *Conditional.* This property is only present when the **field's** `action` is `removed` and the `removed_value` is an Asana resource. This will be only the `gid` and `resource_type` of the resource when the events come from webhooks; this will be the compact representation (and can have fields expanded with [opt_fields](/docs/input-output-options)) when using the [Events](/docs/asana-events) resource.
